title: Sinking of the Lusitania Correct (Kienast 156)
description: sinking of the Lusitania Correct Date Medal 1915; obverse, Cunard liner sinking, no contraband, correct date 7 Mai (May) in exerge; reverse, Death selling tickets in Cunard Office, business before all; the passengers were warned not to board ship as Germany would attack on way to England
creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
